summary:
13. Recalls UNMIS role in facilitating deployment of UN Light and Heavy Support Packages for AMIS and UNAMID.

14. Calls on Government of National Unity to cooperate with all UN operations.

15. Requests Secretary-General to ensure UNMIS compliance with UN zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuse.

16. Requests Secretary-General to include assessments on disarmament, demobilization, and reintegration and potential changes to UNMIS mandate in next report.

17. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
